document.docAuthor: Glowska, Eliza, Chrzanowski, Mateusz & Kaszewska, Katarzyna
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Aulonastus
Kethley, 1970
: 47
. Type-species:
Aulonastus pipili
Kethley, 1970
, by original designation.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU , paratypes : females, male, nymphs at AMU , ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Motacilla alba
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Motacillidae ), type-locality: POLAND , Swinoujscie (
Skoracki 2002 a
).

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 248 ), paratype : female at AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Anthus trivialis
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Motacillidae ), type-locality: POLAND , Wielkopolska, Katy (Skoracki 2011 b);
A. cervinus
( Motacillidae ), SLOVAKIA , Stropkov, Lomne, ( AMU ) (Skoracki 2011 b).

emberizicus Skoracki, Hendricks and Spicer, 2010 : 132
, figs. 1–9 .

euphagus Skoracki, Hendricks and Spicer, 2010 : 134
, figs. 10–17 .

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 278.1– 11 ), paratypes : females, males, nymph, larva at AMU , SNM . Hosts and distribution.
Euphagus cyanocephalus
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Icteridae ), type-locality: USA , California Mono Co. (
Skoracki et al . 2010 b
).

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 249 ), paratypes : females, nymphs at AMU , ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Fringilla coelebs
( Passeriformes : Fringillidae ), type-locality: POLAND , Wielkopolska, Katy (Skoracki 2011 b).

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 350 ), paratypes : females, nymphs, larvae, eggs at AMU , ZISP , ZSM .

Hosts and distribution.
Henicorhina leucosticta
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Troglodytidae ), type-locality: ECUADOR , near Quito (Sikora et al . 2012 ).

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 247 ), paratypes : females at AMU , ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Lanius senator
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Laniidae ), type-locality: EUROPE (Skoracki 2011 b).

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 281 ), paratype females at AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Loxia curvirostra
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Fringillidae ), type-locality: POLAND , Zachodniopomorskie, Darlowko Wschodnie, Bukowo-Kopan (Skoracki 2011 b). Habitat. Covert feathers.

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU , paratypes : females, male, nymphs at AMU , ZISP , SMB . Hosts and distribution.
Luscinia luscinia
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Turdidae ), type-locality: SLOVAKIA (
Skoracki 2002 a
).

Type material.
Holotype female and female paratype at UGA . Hosts and distribution.
Pipilo erythrophthalmus
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Emberizidae ), type-locality: USA , Florida, Highlands Co., Lake Placid (
Kethley 1970
).

pirangus Skoracki, Hendricks and Spicer, 2010 : 138
, figs. 18–26 .

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU , paratypes : female, males, nymphs, larvae at AMU (Syr. 279.1– 12 ). Hosts and distribution.
Piranga ludoviciana
( Passeriformes : Cardinalidae ), type-locality: USA , California, Sierra Co. (
Skoracki et al . 2010 b
).

Type material.
Holotype female at ZISP (T-Sy- 10 ), paratypes : females, male at ZISP . Hosts and distribution. Type-host:
Prunella modularis
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Prunellidae ), type-locality: RUSSIA , Novogrod Prov., Chudovo Distr., Oskuy village (
Bochkov & Mironov 1999
). Habitat. Unknown.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
pteroptochos
Sikora, Kaszewska and Skoracki, 2014
: 422
, figs. 4, 5 .
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU , paratypes : females at AMU , ZSM . Hosts and distribution.
Pteroptochos tarnii
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Rhinocriptidae), type locality: CHILE , Valdivia (Sikora et al . 2014 ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
sturnellus Skoracki, Hendricks and Spicer, 2010 : 141
, figs. 27–35 .

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU , paratypes : females, males, nymph at AMU (Syr. 276.1– 12 ). Hosts and distribution.
Sturnella magna
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Icteridae ), type-locality: USA , Texas, Johnson Co. (
Skoracki et al . 2010 b
).
